ca.weblite.codename1.fontbox

Class FontBoxFontProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.weblite.codename1.fontbox.FontBoxFontProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ca.weblite.pisces.Font.FontProvider

    public class FontBoxFontProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements ca.weblite.pisces.Font.FontProvider
    A font provider for the FontBox library that should be registered with ca.weblite.pisces.Font so that it can make use of true-type fonts loaded through fontbox. Currently this only provides a facade for truetype fonts even though fontbox likely has support for many more kinds. Additional types would probably require a little work to be able to generate Glyphs in teh correct format.
